title: The Telecom Takeover
description: When two mid-level tax accountants realize their newly-acquired company is under attack by foreign spies, they risk their lives to stop the theft.Jim Dennis and Beth Madison were employees in the tax department of Principal Processing Company. After Principal is acquired by Heenehan Telecom Company, Jim and Beth battle to carry out their responsibilities in the dysfunctional work environment of Heenehan. It’s not just the lack of transparency from above or the strange behavior coming from new team member Amber Wolfe. Trying to make sense of what is happening around them, and determined to do the right thing, they unwittingly become entangled with ruthless foreign cyber warriors deep within Heenehan.With the support of friends both inside and outside the company, Jim and Beth attempt to thwart a global network intent on destroying Heenehan and all the organizations with which it does business. When a coworker winds up dead, it’s not just about doing the right thing anymore — it’s about survival.
author: Beverly Winter
